meanings.definition: Behaving or acting in a nervous or erratic manner.
meanings.sent1: The squirrelly child couldn't sit still during the movie.
meanings.sent2: The new puppy was so squirrelly, running around the house in circles.
meanings.sent3: The squirrelly squirrel kept darting back and forth across the yard, making the birds laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were as squirrelly as a squirrel trying to decide which nut to pick.
meanings.sent5: The squirrelly behavior of the students made the teacher's job very challenging.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a squirrel.
meanings.sent1: The fluffy tail on the squirrelly toy made it look so cute.
meanings.sent2: Her squirrelly movements as she climbed the tree were impressive.
meanings.sent3: The squirrelly hat she wore had little ears that wiggled when she moved.
meanings.sent4: The squirrelly pattern on the fabric reminded her of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The squirrelly design on the backpack was a hit with the kids.
